sections.title: Who We Are
sections.content: Founded by passionate cricketers, Seam Cricket Academy is built on a vision to create a dynamic environment where talent is nurtured, technique is honed, and confidence is built. With experienced coaches and a strong emphasis on personal attention, we believe in developing well-rounded cricketers.

sections.title: Our Philosophy
sections.content: At Seam, we go beyond just technique. We instill discipline, focus, and a love for the game in each student creating not just better players, but better sportspeople.

trainers.name: Mr. Vinodh C
trainers.title: Founder & Coach
trainers.bio: A seasoned cricketer with over 20 years of experience in competitive Karnataka cricket, Vinodh C has played for and captained leading league teams across Bengaluru. As the driving force behind Seam Cricket Academy, he brings unmatched passion and leadership to the academyâ€™s mission. His ability to inspire, mentor, and push players to go beyond their limits is what makes him a true game-changer for budding cricketers.

trainers.name: Mr. Patrick Das
trainers.title: Head Coach
trainers.bio: With over 20 years of professional cricketing experience across Karnataka, Coach Patrick Das is a stalwart in the coaching fraternity. He has served as Head Coach at some of the most reputed cricket schools in Bengaluru, building a legacy of discipline and excellence. Currently, he also serves as the Physical Director at Florence Public School, where he continues to mentor young athletes.

trainers.name: Mr. Anish John
trainers.title: Co-Founder & Coach
trainers.bio: A calm, intelligent cricketer and respected coach, Anish John has represented top clubs across every major division in the Bengaluru cricket circuit. With over 20 years of playing experience, he brings a deep understanding of the gameâ€™s technical and mental aspects. Known for his composed demeanor and thoughtful training methods, Coach Anish believes in building confident, self-aware players who excel on and off the field.
